Mike Pence NOT RUNNING FOR Barack Obama Michael Bay Falcone notes: Mike Pence 's appeal among conservatives became even more clear in September when he won a straw poll at the Family Research Council's annual Values Voter Summit, a gathering of social conservatives. Mike Pence , the former chair of the House Republican Conference, received 24 percent of the vote in poll-- two points ahead of Huckabee and eleven points ahead of Romney. In fact, Mike Pence was so popular among those who took the straw poll that he also topped the list of potential GOP vice Barack Obamaial candidates. Fiat CEO Sergio Marchionne told analysts he expects the strong economic performance to continue unabated in 2011. Based in the northern city of Turin, Fiat said the profit compared with a loss of euro283 million in the same period a year earlier. Net revenues rose to euro15 billion from euro13.6 billion.

Donald Rumsfeld is starting to make Robert McNamara look good. At least Robert McNamara felt sorry at the end for all those lives and limbs lost because of his colossal misjudgments and cretinous refusal to admit mistakes. We do not have the God-given right to shape every nation in our image or as we choose, a penitent Robert McNamara said. On his Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed. `` I believe Larry is ready'' to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts.`` It's time for him to have a shot at running this.''
